thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 9 of 235
thread.title: Abigail

author: Abigail
title: Abigail
text:
I've bought about 75+ goods from Groupon and a good 2 dozen of the local deals (mini golf, movies, etc.) and have never once had an issue with them. If there was ever a problem with an order they got back to me faster than I expected (emails, etc.) and resolved my problem, shipping an item, refunding me, etc. Though I rarely have any problems.
They were extremely friendly and the prices are fantastic.
I recommend them to my friends and family. I did more than half of my Christmas shopping on here and will continue to use them!!
